title: elevates
author: elevates
created_time: August 27, 2023, 01:28:39 PMLast edit: October 24, 2023, 04:38:11 AM by elevates

comments.author: JSRAW
comments.body: Pakistan and India look strong enough to feature in the finals. The broadcaster would love it as it provides the opportunity for an extra marquee fixture which means paisa hi paisa. Having said that I personally prefer to see a new winner in this edition, maybe Bongs or Afghanistan against a big team. Pipe dream but i want to see it happening for an epic meltdown.

comments.author: cryptocovetrade
comments.body: Asia Cup starts on 30th August 2023, and I know that everyone can't wait for 2nd September 2023 because on 2nd September is the biggest battle of cricket Pakistan vs India, and you say who will win so, Pakistan has a chance to win this cup because Pakistan is the no.1 ODI cricket team and no.1 Batsman of ODI Babar Azam.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: From Group APakistan and India both would qualify for Super 4From Group BThough tuff for prediction but Bangladesh/Afghanistan and Sri Lanka both would qualify for 4SFrom Super 4 Pakistan and India both would qualify for FinalFor Final this year I can't predict anything.Because Pakistan has already occupied the top spot in the ODI rankings and their batting line-up is quite strong. Therefore, India is not behind Pakistan in the Asia Cup, but it is not possible to make any predictions about these two teams. Only the result of the final will tell which team will be the champion.

comments.author: fullhdpixel
comments.body: Quote from: LDL on August 27, 2023, 04:28:42 PMPakistan and India both would qualify for FinalFor Final this year I can't predict anything.Because Pakistan has already occupied the top spot in the ODI rankings and their batting line-up is quite strong. Therefore, India is not behind Pakistan in the Asia Cup, but it is not possible to make any predictions about these two teams. Only the result of the final will tell which team will be the champion.I agree with you about the this predictions of this even with most chances Pakistan vs India final is going to have fair chance because all other three big teams are not capable of giving them good fight, specially I am disappointed with the Sri Lankan team which was doing good job but now suddenly due to few injuries and internal issues they are having trouble.Bangladesh and Afghanistan are also not good as we need to be them even in recent three matches series Afghanistan bowlers done good job, but their main batsmen were not able to give their best consistently which hurts them badly throughout series, and they have to face whitewash in this three matches series India is always good in this event with Pakistan is unpredictable against them but still it's going to be interesting event after very long wait.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: fullhdpixel on August 27, 2023, 04:44:41 PMBangladesh and Afghanistan are also not good as we need to be them even in recent three matches series Afghanistan bowlers done good job, but their main batsmen were not able to give their best consistently which hurts them badly throughout series, and they have to face whitewash in this three matches series India is always good in this event with Pakistan is unpredictable against them but still it's going to be interesting event after very long wait.Nothing can be said for sure about the match between Bangladesh and Afghanistan because the spinner department of Afghanistan is much better than the spinner department of Bangladesh. Moreover, Afghanistan's opening pair is more reliable than Bangladesh's opening pair. For now, I cannot say anything about the match between Bangladesh and Afghanistan. However, some of Sri Lanka's batsmen and bowlers will not be in the squad due to injuries especially W. Hasaranga is likely to be out of the Asia Cup so the balance of the team will not be maintained due to the absence of one of their key players. This time it will be very difficult for Sri Lanka to pass the group stage in the Asia Cup.

comments.author: GigaBit
comments.body: Quote from: fullhdpixel on August 27, 2023, 04:44:41 PMI agree with you about the this predictions of this even with most chances Pakistan vs India final is going to have fair chance because all other three big teams are not capable of giving them good fight, specially I am disappointed with the Sri Lankan team which was doing good job but now suddenly due to few injuries and internal issues they are having trouble.Bangladesh and Afghanistan are also not good as we need to be them even in recent three matches series Afghanistan bowlers done good job, but their main batsmen were not able to give their best consistently which hurts them badly throughout series, and they have to face whitewash in this three matches series India is always good in this event with Pakistan is unpredictable against them but still it's going to be interesting event after very long wait.India and Pakistan Super four qualifier is almost certain so it is as easy to predict in Group A but much harder in Group B. Because there is no way to say that any of the three teams here have performed consistently well. But Sri Lanka is a better team than Bangladesh and Afghanistan. I am most confused about Bangladesh and Afghanistan. Who can qualify from these two teams in Super Four? Bangladesh team's chance is slightly higher if we calculated  normally. However, it will be difficult for the Bangladesh team to maintain their position if Afghanistan is on fire.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: I feel this time we would see both Indian & Pakistan in the finals. It would be great if my wish comes true as the cricket faternity more than one matche from these two old rivals. We only are able to watch them play against each other in ICC events this time we get the opportunity to watch them in ACC event. Great to see Nepal being part of the tournament. I haven't witnessed them playing ever since I heard Nepal has an international cricket team. I hope they deliver what they are expected to do. They would be playing their first international match I guess against Pakistan. It won't be that easy for them to defeat a good team like Pakistan.

comments.author: LDL
comments.created_time: August 28, 2023, 02:17:42 AMLast edit: August 28, 2023, 02:33:35 AM by LDL
comments.body: Quote from: pakhitheboss on August 28, 2023, 12:00:15 AMGreat to see Nepal being part of the tournament. I haven't witnessed them playing ever since I heard Nepal has an international cricket team. I hope they deliver what they are expected to do. They would be playing their first international match I guess against Pakistan. It won't be that easy for them to defeat a good team like Pakistan. Group A consists of India, Pakistan and Nepal, although in this case, Nepal's matches with India and Pakistan will be a truly uneven match. However, Nepal will not be able to compete with India and Pakistan in the 50-over innings as Nepali batsmen will feel helpless against the Indian and Pakistani bowling departments. Moreover, the Nepalese batsmen will not be able to withstand the bowling action of Pakistan's Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, Harish Rauf.  On the other hand, Indian bowlers are also equal and Nepal is weak to them too, so I don't see any chance of Nepal winning the Asia Cup.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: After much speculation, the Asia Cup 2023 tournament is finally going to be held. It is reported that the teams that have already qualified for the Asia Cup have reached Sri Lanka. Pakistan, India and Sri Lanka have always dominated the Asia Cup but even if Sri Lanka is not likely to do well in the 2023 Asia Cup, Pakistan and India have the potential to do well and Bangladesh can do well. Either Pakistan India or Bangladesh is going to win the title of the Asia Cup 2023 tournament. Just before the Asia Cup, Pakistan beat Afghanistan 3-0 in the ODI series and are at the top of the ODI rankings. Such an achievement will undoubtedly help boost Pakistan's confidence ahead of the start of the tournament.

comments.author: Bd officer
comments.body: In Asia Cup Group A, Pakistan, India, Nepal. In Group B, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Afghanistan. This year's Asia Cup is going to be 50 overs. So from Group A, these two teams, India and Pakistan, will advance to the Super Four. Because I am not expecting a good performance from Nepal in the 50 over game. In Group B, Bangladesh is ahead of three teams in the ODI format, so Bangladesh can make it to the Super Four. Between these two teams, Sri Lanka and Afghanistan, Sri Lanka is the better team. Because even though Afghanistan has a good bowling line-up, the batting line is a bit weak. So Bangladesh and Sri Lanka from Group B these two teams can reach the Super Four. It is not possible to say which team will make it to the finals without watching a few matches. However, these two teams, India and Pakistan, are ahead of all teams for the finals.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: After so many controversies now we will actually see the Asia Cup 2023. When the shifting controversy started I had a feeling either this tournament would get cancelled or might be played without Pakistan. Only two more days left for the tournament to start. The main match will be played on 2nd of September between India & Pakistan. I am hopeful that we can see both the teams play against each other after 2nd too.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: The problem with India is that despite having some of the best players, they never win major tournaments. They perform well during the group phase, and then always go down during the knockout stage. Initially I thought that by removing panauti senior (Kohli) from the captaincy this can be resolved. But even panauti junior (Rohit) has gone the same way. Given this, I would assume that Pakistan has the best chance to win the tournament this time. Sri Lanka has performed well recently, but they are a shadow of what they were two decades ago. Afghanistan and Nepal are there just to make up the numbers.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on August 28, 2023, 04:46:24 AMAfter so many controversies now we will actually see the Asia Cup 2023. When the shifting controversy started I had a feeling either this tournament would get cancelled or might be played without Pakistan. Only two more days left for the tournament to start. The main match will be played on 2nd of September between India & Pakistan. I am hopeful that we can see both the teams play against each other after 2nd too. People around the world wait to enjoy the match between India and Pakistan. India vs Pakistan matches are the focus of everyone's interest because these two teams never face each other except in major tournaments. India and Pakistan are two of the most competitive teams in cricket, so it is natural that people will be interested in watching the matches of these two teams. I think the match that is going to be played between India and Pakistan on September 2 will be watched by the maximum number of people. In major tournaments, broadcast channels earn maximum revenue only through India and Pakistan matches, so if India and Pakistan matches are abandoned for any reason, the broadcast channels may suffer losses.

comments.author: Minor Miner
comments.body: Pakistan is my favorite team in this year's Asia Cup. And personally I think Pakistan has the best chance to win the Asia Cup. I have watched Pakistan's recent ODI series performances against Afghanistan and New Zealand. They played well. Pakistan won the series 4-1 against New Zealand and 3-0 against Afghanistan. Almost every batsman in the team is capable of batting well now. Pakistan's dependence on Babar Azam and Rizwan has reduced a lot. This is why Pakistan's performance is stable now.Quote from: Sithara007 on August 29, 2023, 02:26:20 AMThe problem with India is that despite having some of the best players, they never win major tournaments. They perform well during the group phase, and then always go down during the knockout stage. Initially I thought that by removing panauti senior (Kohli) from the captaincy this can be resolved. But even panauti junior (Rohit) has gone the same way. Given this, I would assume that Pakistan has the best chance to win the tournament this time. Sri Lanka has performed well recently, but they are a shadow of what they were two decades ago. Afghanistan and Nepal are there just to make up the numbers. There is no doubt that the Indian team is strong. They have a lot of talented players. But this team is not in good form. Team players are not playing well consistently. The performance of India's opening pair in particular has now become very erratic. In the last few series I have not seen good performances from India as expected. Asia Cup is very important for India. Because the Asia Cup can be like a warm up series for India before the next World Cup.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: Sithara007 on August 29, 2023, 02:26:20 AMThe problem with India is that despite having some of the best players, they never win major tournaments. They perform well during the group phase, and then always go down during the knockout stage. Initially I thought that by removing panauti senior (Kohli) from the captaincy this can be resolved. But even panauti junior (Rohit) has gone the same way. Given this, I would assume that Pakistan has the best chance to win the tournament this time. Sri Lanka has performed well recently, but they are a shadow of what they were two decades ago. Afghanistan and Nepal are there just to make up the numbers. Yes what you say is 100% true because I have seen India perform very well in group stage but when they come from group stage to get knockout then the best batsmen of the team play badly and finally they can't make knockout stage confirmed. Over the past few years, India have seen such poor performances in the T20 World Cup, ICC ODI World Cup, and Asia Cups. But even though Pakistan played poorly in the group stage, they performed well in the knockout stage and have a record of winning the championship. In this year's Asia Cup, I hold India as a favorite, but if they have no problems in the group stage, how well they can perform in the knockout phase is just a matter of time.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: Quote from: Minor Miner on August 29, 2023, 02:48:18 AMThere is no doubt that the Indian team is strong. They have a lot of talented players. But this team is not in good form. Team players are not playing well consistently. The performance of India's opening pair in particular has now become very erratic. In the last few series I have not seen good performances from India as expected. Asia Cup is very important for India. Because the Asia Cup can be like a warm up series for India before the next World Cup.I know that the Indian players are targeting the ODI world cup, because it is a golden opportunity to win a major ICC trophy after so many years. They believe that they can use the home conditions to their advantage. Obviously senior players including Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Ravindra Jadeja and Mohammed Shami would like to get their hands on an ICC trophy before they retire. And this year's world cup represent the most probable pathway. And as you said, Asia Cup will act as a warm up series. Honestly, if they fail to win world cup this time also, then these senior players should retire from limited overs cricket.

comments.author: Minor Miner
comments.body: Quote from: Sithara007 on August 29, 2023, 03:16:11 AMQuote from: Minor Miner on August 29, 2023, 02:48:18 AMThere is no doubt that the Indian team is strong. They have a lot of talented players. But this team is not in good form. Team players are not playing well consistently. The performance of India's opening pair in particular has now become very erratic. In the last few series I have not seen good performances from India as expected. Asia Cup is very important for India. Because the Asia Cup can be like a warm up series for India before the next World Cup.I know that the Indian players are targeting the ODI world cup, because it is a golden opportunity to win a major ICC trophy after so many years. They believe that they can use the home conditions to their advantage. Obviously senior players including Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, Ravindra Jadeja and Mohammed Shami would like to get their hands on an ICC trophy before they retire. And this year's world cup represent the most probable pathway. And as you said, Asia Cup will act as a warm up series. Honestly, if they fail to win world cup this time also, then these senior players should retire from limited overs cricket.  The most important thing for India is that India will be playing on their familiar pitch in the World Cup. The World Cup is going to be held in India. And every pitch is very well known by the Indian players. Due to this, India is considered as the favorite in the upcoming ODI World Cup.There is no doubt that the Indian team is very strong. Also you said that this could be the last ODI World Cup for several of India's senior players. This is probably the last ODI World Cup for Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma and Jadeja. So they will try their best to win the World Cup. But the way India has played in the last few series, it is not enough to become the champions of the World Cup. The performance of India's batsmen needs to improve. Otherwise, it will not be possible for the team to become world champions.

comments.author: Bitcoin_people
comments.body: The first match of Asia Cup will be played between Pakistan vs Nepal, the match will start at Multan Cricket Stadium in Pakistan.  Between the two teams we know Pakistan is in better form in this Asia Cup so we can say that Pakistan can win this match against Nepal. The first match of the group will be played tomorrow and we will see a good game between the two teams. If I see betting avoidance where there are many differences between Pakistani and Nepali accordingly I can say that betting for Pakistan is possible to win.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: Quote from: Minor Miner on August 29, 2023, 03:23:27 AMThe most important thing for India is that India will be playing on their familiar pitch in the World Cup. The World Cup is going to be held in India. And every pitch is very well known by the Indian players. Due to this, India is considered as the favorite in the upcoming ODI World Cup.There is no doubt that the Indian team is very strong. Also you said that this could be the last ODI World Cup for several of India's senior players. This is probably the last ODI World Cup for Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma and Jadeja. So they will try their best to win the World Cup. But the way India has played in the last few series, it is not enough to become the champions of the World Cup. The performance of India's batsmen needs to improve. Otherwise, it will not be possible for the team to become world champions.The problem with playing matches in India is that not just the Indian players, but many of the overseas players are also familiar with the ground and climatic conditions. A lot of foreign players (especially those from countries such as Australia, England, South Africa and West Indies) have been a regular fixture of the Indian Premier League, ever since it was launched in 2008. As a result, foreign players are comfortable with Indian conditions, while the Indian players don't have that advantage while playing in SENA nations.
